parameters.definition: Cost of fertilizer C per kg
Cost of fertilizer Y per kg
Amount of nitrous oxide per kg in fertilizer C
Amount of vitamin mix per kg in fertilizer C
Amount of nitrous oxide per kg in fertilizer Y
Amount of vitamin mix per kg in fertilizer Y
Minimum required units of nitrous oxide in the growth compound
Minimum required units of vitamin mix in the growth compound

description: Ayse produces a plant growth compound by mixing two types of fertilizer: C and Y. This growth compound must contain at least \param{MinNitrous} units of nitrous oxide and \param{MinVitamin} units of vitamin mix. Fertilizer C and Y cost \param{CostC} and \param{CostY} per kg respectively. Fertilizer C contains \param{NitrousC} units of nitrous oxide per kg and \param{VitaminC} units of vitamin mix per kg. Fertilizer Y contains \param{NitrousY} units of nitrous oxide per kg and \param{VitaminY} unit of vitamin mix per kg. Determine the minimum cost of Ayse's compound.
